sections.heading: Plan Your Scene
sections.body: Choose a context: **School day**, **CafÃ© meetup**, or **Library study**. Script 6â€“10 short clauses (3â€“5 signs each) with time-first.

sections.heading: Rehearse with NMMs
sections.body: Mark lines needing **YES/NO** vs **WH**. Practice with a mirror: brows up for Y/N, brows down for WH. Keep eye gaze to the imagined partner.

callouts.title: Space Consistency
callouts.body: Assign fixed points for **HOME**, **SCHOOL**, **STORE** and reuse them.

sections.heading: Record: 30â€“45 Seconds
sections.body: Record in one take if possible. Use at least **2 time words**, **2 places**, **1 color description**, and **1 food/drink exchange**.

sections.heading: Peer Feedback
sections.body: Swap videos. Each partner gives **one strength** and **one suggestion** on NMMs or order. Sign feedback if possible; keep it kind and specific.
